elements.text: you can see in the page source that the links are not proper:

<meta name="author" content="Miguel Raz Guzmán Macedo">
  <title>DoctorDocstrings.jl</title>

  <link rel="icon" type="image/png"  href="/assets/favicon.ico">

  <!-- CSS -->
  
   <link rel="stylesheet" href="/libs/highlight/styles/atom-one-dark.css">
   
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/bootstrap.min.css">
the paths should be
DoctorDocstrings.jl/css/...
this is set by the prepath in config.md (which you've set properly) and activated when you run the
optimize
. I don't have time to look into this right now but that's why you're seeing something ugly, basically the address of the CSS file is incorrect
